title: Outgoing CJCSC pays farewell call on President
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 24 (APP): Chairman Joint Chiefs of Staff Committee (CJCSC) General Nadeem Raza paid a farewell call on President Dr Arif Alvi here at the Aiwan-e-Sadr on Thursday.
The president lauded the services of General Nadeem Raza for the defence of the country.
He also expressed best wishes for the outgoing CJCSC.
